parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: ExposureIp
parameters.description: The public IP address of the server or the cloud asset.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID of the asset.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: 20. If you leave this parameter empty, 20 entries are returned on each page.

>  We recommend that you do not leave this parameter empty.

parameters.name: ResourceDirectoryAccountId
parameters.description:
The Alibaba Cloud account ID of the member in the resource directory.

>  You can call the [DescribeMonitorAccounts](~~DescribeMonitorAccounts~~) operation to obtain the ID.

parameters.name: StatisticsType
parameters.description:
The type of the exposed asset. Valid values:

*   **exposureType**: gateway assets
*   **exposurePort**: ports
*   **exposureComponent**: system components
*   **exposureIp**: IP addresses

parameters.name: StatisticsTypeGatewayType
parameters.description:
The type of the gateway asset. This parameter is required when the **StatisticsType** parameter is set to **exposureType**. Valid values:

*   **SLB**: the public IP address of a Server Load Balancer (SLB) instance
*   **DNAT**: the NAT gateway that connects to the Internet by using the DNAT feature

parameters.name: StatisticsTypeInstanceValue
parameters.description: The ID of the gateway asset. This parameter is required when the **StatisticsType** parameter is set to **exposureType**.
